sr_model_file_path.display_key: Path to the trained model file(usually the pb file) using DeepSpeech

sr_alphabet_file_path.display_key: Path to the alphabet file(usually the alphabet.txt file) resulting through DeepSpeech training process.

sr_lm_file_path.display_key: Path to the lm file(usually the lm.binary file) resulting through DeepSpeech training process.

sr_trie_file_path.display_key: Path to the trie file(usually the trie file) resulting through DeepSpeech training process.

tasks_model_filepath.display_key: File path to the pre trained Task Prediction model

tasks_namespaces_folderpath.display_key: Path to the Folder containing Task Executors

local_music_folderpath.display_key: Path to the Local Song Database Folder

db_location_names_filepath.display_key: Path to the database file which contains location names

db_location_mapper_filepath.display_key: Path to the database file which contains geo-locations(latitudes, longitudes)
